Uses of Interface
org.jnosql.diana.api.Value

  • Packages that use Value 
    Package Description
    org.jnosql.artemis.graph
    In computing, a graph database is a database that uses graph structures for semantic queries with nodes, edges and properties to represent and store data.
    org.jnosql.artemis.reflection
    This package contains all reflections utils, the mapping of Field and class and also the extension to load all entity.
    org.jnosql.diana.api
    Diana is a flexible and extensible API to connect NoSQL databases.
    org.jnosql.diana.api.column
    This package contains all objects to use a Column Family API.
    org.jnosql.diana.api.document
    This package contains all objects to use a Document Collection.
    org.jnosql.diana.api.key
    This package contains all Key-value domain API.
    org.jnosql.diana.api.key.query

      Finds a list of values from keys

      Finds the Value from a key
      List<Value> KeyValuePreparedStatement.getResultList()
      Executes a query and return the result as List
      Optional<Value> KeyValuePreparedStatement.getSingleResult()
      Returns the result as a single element otherwise it will return an Optional.empty()
      default List<Value> BucketManager.query(String query)
      Executes a query and returns the result, when the operations are put, remove and get command it will return the result of the operation when the command is remove or put it will return an empty collection.
      List<Value> KeyValueQueryParser.query(String query, BucketManager manager)
      Executes a query and returns the result, when the operations are put, get and del command it will return the result of the operation when the command is either put or del it will return an empty collection.
